roleset.name: to flow over or absorb

role.descr: engulfed in what? actual liquid/entity surrounding arg1

example.name: transitive
example.text: A landslide engulfed a hillside slum in Sao Paulo , Brazil , and at least 20 people , most of them children , were missing and feared [*-1] dead .
example.arg: a hillside slum in Sao Paulo , Brazil ,

example.name: passive
example.text: If Washington 's elites ever succeed in [*-2] bursting the tax dam , Americans will be engulfed [*]in a red sea of new spending programs , such as federalized child care .
example.arg: Washington 's elites ever succeed in [*-2] bursting the tax dam
[*]in a red sea of new spending programs , such as federalized child care

example.name: With arg2, substance engulfed in
example.text: In spite of the depressing scene engulfing the Arab world with wars and crises...

roleset.note: ENGULF-V NOTES: Frames file for 'engulf' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from engulf.01-v predicate notes)
